q: Do you offer a free trial?
a: Yes — we offer a 14-day trial for the Pro plan with no credit card required. For Enterprise pilots, contact sales to arrange an extended evaluation.

q: What happens if I go over my included devices?
a: Each plan lists included devices; overage is billed per device per month at the plan's overage rate. Use our usage estimator in the dashboard to forecast costs before upgrading.

q: How does yearly billing work and how much can I save?
a: When a yearly price is available, it reflects a discounted annual total. The pricing UI shows percent savings and the effective per-month rate when toggled to yearly.
Pro includes common integrations (S3, Slack, PagerDuty). Enterprise supports additional connectors such as Splunk and ServiceNow; see the table for full details.

q: Is there an SLA for Enterprise?
a: Yes — Enterprise plans include SLA options (uptime guarantees) and priority support. Contact sales to customize the SLA and uptime percentage.

q: Can I change plans mid-billing period?
a: Yes — you can upgrade immediately. Prorations are handled automatically in the billing system; downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle.

q: Do you offer seat or user-based pricing?
a: Most plans include a set number of users; additional seats can be added and are billed per user per month for large accounts. Contact sales for enterprise volume pricing.
